author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: UK sees a further 684 fatalities as Spain’s death rate slows
description: Residents of Wuhan told to stay inside and be vigilant, as death tolls in Europe rise
content:
Spain reported the first decline in new coronavirus deaths in over a week on Friday, suggesting strict confinement measures may be helping to bring the outbreak under control. 
Total deaths rose by 932 to 10,935 in the past 24 hours, a smaller gain than Thur… [+8676 chars]
